meanings.sent1: She is the quickest runner in our class.
meanings.sent2: The cheetah is known for being the quickest animal on land.
meanings.sent3: The quickest squirrel in the park always beats the others to the acorns.
meanings.sent4: His quickest decision was to jump out of the way of the speeding car.
meanings.sent5: The quickest way to finish the race is to keep a steady pace.

meanings.sent1: He finished his homework quickest among all the students.
meanings.sent2: She completed the puzzle quickest out of everyone.
meanings.sent3: The chef prepared the meal quickest when he had all the ingredients ready.
meanings.sent4: Time flew by quickest when they were having fun.
meanings.sent5: The train arrived at the station quickest than expected.

meanings.sent1: The quickest car in the race zoomed past the others effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: The river flowed quickest during the rainy season.
meanings.sent3: The quickest elevator in the building always made people feel a bit dizzy.
meanings.sent4: His quickest reflex saved him from bumping into the door.
meanings.sent5: The quickest heartbeat he felt was when he saw her smile.
